tags.name: Request Resource
tags.description: Represents the starting point of pre-spend authorizations within Concur Request

tags.name: Workflow Resource
tags.description: Manage workflow transitions for a Request

tags.name: Travel Agency Resource
tags.description: Get details of travel agencies integrated with Concur Request

tags.name: Expected Expense Resource
tags.description: Manage expected expenses attached to a Request

get.summary: Get the list of existing Requests
get.description: Provides the list of existing Requests. Can be based on the Request owner, the workflow status of the Request and other available parameters.

parameters.name: view
parameters.description: Name of the perimeter defining the Requests to get

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request owner to use when searching for Requests

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Pagination : number of records to return per page - maximum limit is 100, if higher value or digit value is set, a 400 error code will be displayed

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Pagination : index of the first record

parameters.name: modifiedAfter
parameters.description: Lower bound of modification date. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ or yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: modifiedBefore
parameters.description: Upper bound of modification date. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ or yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: The name of the field on which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order (ASC or DESC)

parameters.name: approvedAfter
parameters.description: Lower bound of approval date. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss

parameters.name: approvedBefore
parameters.description: Upper bound of approval date. Format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss

400.description: Bad param(s) : the request is invalid

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation.

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request.

errors.errorMessage: Entity is offline, please try again later.

post.description: Creates a new Request for a traveler.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request owner for whom the Request will be created

400.description: Invalid request body (no location found matching the country code and city name provided, invalid date, etc.)

errors.errorMessage: At least 1 required field has an empty value.

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation

get.summary: Get the content of an existing Request
get.description: Provides the content of an existing Request, mainly the content of the Request header.

parameters.name: requestUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request

400.description: Bad param(s) : the request is invalid (user Id for this request has not been found, concur correlation id of the request is not a valid UUID, etc.)

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation
Entity is offline, please try again later.

put.summary: Update the content of an existing Request
put.description: Updates the content of an existing Request. Update of the following fields is supported : `comment`, `startDate`, `startTime`, `endDate`, `endTime`, `expensePolicy`, `name`, `businessPurpose`, `mainDestination`, `travelAgency`, and `custom fields`. Other fields will be ignored. Partial update is supported, you may submit only the fields to update in the body, fields not present in the body will remain unchanged.

parameters.name: requestUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: request

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user

400.description: Invalid request body (no location found matching the country code and city name provided, invalid date, etc.)

errors.errorMessage: At least 1 required field has an empty value.

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation
Entity is offline, please try again later.

delete.description: Deletes an existing Request. Possible only if a Request can be deleted.

parameters.name: requestUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation.

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation

get.summary: Get the list of comments for an existing Request
get.description: Provides the list of comments for an existing Request (information displayed in the `comment`field of the Request header). Historization of comments is possible on the Request header. This endpoint will provide all the comments written during the life of the Request.

parameters.name: requestUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request

400.description: Bad param(s) : the request is invalid (user Id for this request has not been found, concur correlation id of the request is not a valid UUID, etc.)

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation.

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation
Entity is offline, please try again later.

get.summary: Get the list of exceptions linked to an existing Request
get.description: Provides the list of exceptions linked to an existing Request. All alerts raised within the Request header (exception messages generated via audit rules) will be provided via this endpoint.

parameters.name: requestUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request

400.description: Bad param(s) : the request is invalid (user Id for this request has not been found, concur correlation id of the request is not a valid UUID, etc.)

post.summary: Move an existing Request in the approval workflow
post.description: Moves an existing Request within the approval workflow. All available workflow actions are displayed in the `action` parameter.

parameters.name: requestUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Request

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: The workflow state transition to be executed

parameters.name: comment
parameters.description: Only usable when the workflow action is set to ‘sendback’.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the company

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user performing the status transition

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation - User approving their own Request, or without approver/processor role

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request

409.description: You must identify an approver before the Request moves on to the next workflow step.

errors.errorMessage: You must identify an approver before the Request moves on to the next workflow step.

500.description: An unexpected error has prevented the operation

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation
Entity is offline, please try again later.

put.description: Updates the content of an expected expense. Partial update is not supported, the full body needs to be provided to update a field.

delete.summary: Delete an expected expense from the Request
delete.description: Deletes an expected expense from the Request. Self-booked trip segments (created from the online Concur Travel booking tool) cannot be deleted from a Request, only Concur Travel may perform this action.

parameters.name: expenseUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the expected expense to delete

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user performing the deletion of the expected expense

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this operation

404.description: Not found - You tried to get a non-existing request.

500.description: An unexpected error has prevented the operation

errors.errorMessage: An unexpected error has prevented the operation
Entity is offline, please try again later.

get.summary: Get the list of comments for an existing expected expense
get.description: Provides the list of comments for an existing expected expense (information displayed in the `comment`field of the expected expense). Historization of comments is possible on an expected expense. This endpoint will provide all the comments written within an expected expense during the life of the Request.

parameters.name: expenseUuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the expected expense

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user getting the content of the comments

allocationAmount.description: The amount of the allocation calculated with the percentage value multiplied by the transaction amount on the expense. This amount is given in the transaction's currency

approvedAmount.description: The amount of the allocation calculated with the percentage value multiplied by the approved amount on the expense. This amount is given in the user's currency

expenseId.description: The unique identifier of the expense associated with the allocation

percentEdited.description: Whether the allocation percent has been edited

percentage.description: The percentage of the total expense that this allocation represents

postedAmount.description: The amount of the allocation calculated with the percentage value multiplied by the posted amount on the expense. This amount is given in the user's currency

systemAllocation.description: Whether the allocation is a system allocation. It is usually hidden or read only for Request users

currency.description: The 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency in which the amount is expressed

value.description: The amount in the defined currency

code.description: The code of the approval status of the Request

name.description: The approval status of the Request in the current user's language

creationDateTime.description: Creation date of the comment (in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss.SSS)

isLatest.description: True when the comment has been edited since the last workflow transition

code.description: The short code of the list item. For non-list fields, this value will be blank

href.description: The link to get this list item on the list service.

value.description: The value of the custom field or the value of the list item id for list fields

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

middleInitial.description: The middle initial of the employee

id.description: Unique identifier of the related object

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

allocations.description: List of the allocations composing this segment

approvedAmount.description: The approved amount of the expected expense

budgetAccrualDate.description: The date to determine which budgets are affected (in the format yyyy-MM-dd’T’HH:mm:ss.SSS’Z’)

businessPurpose.description: The purpose of the expected expense

comments.description: Comment history of the expected expense

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate that applies to the expected expense

expenseType.description: The expense type of the expected expense

id.description: The unique identifier of the expected expense

lastComment.description: The last comment of the expected expense

lastModifiedDate.description: The date when this expense was last modified

location.description: The location of the expected expense

orgUnit1.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration

orgUnit2.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration

orgUnit3.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration

orgUnit4.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration

orgUnit5.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration

orgUnit6.description: The details from the Custom fields. These fields may not have data, depending on the configuration

parentRequest.description: The parent Request of the expected expense

postedAmount.description: The posted amount of the expected expense

remainingAmount.description: The remaining amount of the expected expense

source.description: The source that created the expected expense. It can be CASH_ADVANCE or TRAVEL_ALLOWANCE. This field will be empty in any other case.

transactionAmount.description: The amount of the expected expense, in the transaction currency paid to the vendor

tripData.description: This property is non empty if this expected expense represents a travel Segment (AIR, CAR, HOTEL, ...)

vendor.description: The vendor of the expected expense

href.description: The link to the unique identifier of source. Will be empty if source is ALLOCATION or CASH_ADVANCE.

id.description: The unique identifier of the source

type.description: Defines the type of the source which can be one of "ALLOCATION", "CASH_ADVANCE", "EXPENSE", "HEADER"

operation.description: Exchange rate operation. Possible values: 'MULTIPLY' or 'DIVIDE'

href.description: Hyperlink to the resource for the expense type definition

id.description: Unique identifier of the expense type

rel.description: Relation type as defined by the server.

code.description: The short code of the list item.

href.description: Hyperlink to the resource for the list item.

value.description: The value of the list item id.

city.description: The city name of the location

iataCode.description: The IATA code for the location

approvalLimitDate.description: The date by which the Request must be approved. This element appears only when integrated with Concur Travel

approvalStatus.description: The approval status of the Request

approved.description: Indicates whether this Request is approved

approver.description: The approver of this Request. Null when Request is in an approval status different from SUBMITTED

authorizedDate.description: For an approved Request, the date the approval process was completed

businessPurpose.description: The business purpose of the Request

canceledPostApproval.description: Indicates whether this Request was canceled post approval

closed.description: Indicates whether the Request is closed

comment.description: The last comment attached to this Request

creationDate.description: The date when the Request was created (in the format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')

endDate.description: The end date of the Request (in the format YYYY-MM-DD)

endTime.description: The end time of the Request (in the format HH:MM)

eventRequest.description: The parent Event Request to which this child Request is related.

everSentBack.description: Indicates whether the Request has ever been sent back to the employee

expenses.description: Expected expenses attached to this Request

extensionOf.description: The Request that this Request is an extension of, or addendum to

highestExceptionLevel.description: The highest level of exception contained in this Request. One of { NONE, WARNING, ERROR }

href.description: Hyperlink to the resource for this Request

id.description: The unique identifier of the Request

lastModified.description: The date when the Request was last modified

mainDestination.description: The main destination of the Request

owner.description: The employee who owns the Request

pendingApproval.description: Indicates whether this Request is pending approval

policy.description: The policy that applies to the Request

requestId.description: The public key of the Request (unique per customer)

startDate.description: The start date of the Request (in the format YYYY-MM-DD)

startTime.description: The start time of the Request (in the format HH:MM)

submitDate.description: The date when the Request was submitted (last submit date in case of recall)

totalApprovedAmount.description: The total amount of approved expenses in the Request, expressed in the reimbursement currency of the employee at the time they created the Request

totalPostedAmount.description: The total amount of the Request, expressed in the reimbursement currency of the employee at the time he created the Request

totalRemainingAmount.description: The total amount not included in an Expense report, expressed in the reimbursement currency of the employee at the time he created the Request

travelAgency.description: The travel agency office that is managing the trip associated to this Request

type.description: The type of the Request, inherited from the Request policy type

approvalLimitDate.description: The date by which the Request must be approved. This element appears only when integrated with Concur Travel

approvalStatus.description: The approval status of the Request

approved.description: Indicates whether this Request is approved

approver.description: The approver of this Request. Null when Request is in an approval status different from SUBMITTED

authorizedDate.description: For an approved Request, the date the approval process was completed

businessPurpose.description: The business purpose of the Request

canceledPostApproval.description: Indicates whether this Request was canceled post approval

cashAdvances.description: The cash advances attached to this Request

closed.description: Indicates whether the Request is closed

comment.description: The last comment attached to this Request

creationDate.description: The date when the Request was created (in the format yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z')

href.description: Hyperlink to the resource for this Request

id.description: The unique identifier of the Request

lastModified.description: The date when the Request was last modified

mainDestination.description: The main destination of the Request

owner.description: The employee who owns the Request

pendingApproval.description: Indicates whether this Request is pending approval

policy.description: The policy that applies to the Request

requestId.description: The public key of the Request (unique per customer)

startDate.description: The start date of the Request (in the format YYYY-MM-DD)

startTime.description: The start time of the Request (in the format HH:MM)

submitDate.description: The date when the Request was submitted (last submit date in case of recall)

totalApprovedAmount.description: The total amount of approved expenses in the Request, expressed in the reimbursement currency of the employee at the time they created the Request

totalPostedAmount.description: The total amount of the Request, expressed in the reimbursement currency of the employee at the time he created the Request

totalRemainingAmount.description: The total amount not included in an Expense report, expressed in the reimbursement currency of the employee at the time he created the Request

travelAgency.description: The travel agency office that is managing the trip associated to this Request

type.description: The type of the Request, inherited from the Request policy type

code.description: The system exception code defined for the exception. Example: BADCODE

isBlocking.description: Defines whether the exception will prevent the Request from being submitted

level.description: The numeric level associated with the exception. Example: 99

message.description: The user-facing message defined for the exception

parameters.description: Parameters for the messages of the exception

id.description: Unique identifier of the related object

requestId.description: The public key of the Request (unique per customer).
The public id of the Request

id.description: Unique identifier of the related object

code.description: The code of the type inherited from the Request policy type

label.description: The label of the type inherited from the Request policy type

href.description: Hyperlink to the resource for this Request policy

id.description: Unique identifier of the Request policy

class.description: The class of the segment leg.

classOfService.description: The class of service of the segment leg. For example, in the case of an air segment, this field would contain the one-letter booking code: Y for economy class, or F for first class...

comment.description: A comment for this segment leg

endDate.description: The end date of the segment leg (in the format YYYY-MM-DD).It represents the arrival date of AIRFR and TRAIN segments, check out date for HOTEL or drop off for CARRT

endLocation.description: The end location of the segment leg

endLocationDetail.description: Additional details about the end location. It is used for HOTEL and CARRT segments.

endTime.description: The end time of the segment leg (in the format HH:MM). It is expressed in the local time of the end location

id.description: The unique identifier of the segment leg

returnLeg.description: This value indicates if the leg is a return leg or not.

segmentLocator.description: The identifier for Concur Travel segments

startDate.description: The start date of the segment leg (in the format YYYY-MM-DD). It represents the departure date of AIRFR and TRAIN segments, check in date for HOTEL or pickup for CARRT

startLocation.description: The start location of the segment leg (for HOTEL, this is empty)

startLocationDetail.description: Additional details about the start location. It is used for HOTEL and CARRT segments.

startTime.description: The start time of the segment leg (in the format HH:MM). It is expressed in the local time of the start location

vendorName.description: The name of the vendor of this segment leg.

category.description: The category of the segment type

code.description: The code of the segment type. This will most frequently be a String, but could also be an integer in the case of a custom expense typeFor example, would be category = REQ_SEG_AIRFR and code = AIRFR for a regular air segment, but category = REQ_SEG_AIRFR and code = 10325 for a custom air segment.

dailyTravelAllowanceId.description: The fixed daily travel allowance id associated with the expected expense

agencyBooked.description: Indicates whether this trip has been booked by a Travel Agency or not. True if this trip is (or has to be) handled by a Travel Agency.

legs.description: List of the legs composing this segment

selfBooked.description: True if this trip has been reserved by Concur Travel, or if Concur Travel has retrieved the trip information in the GDS

tripType.description: Indicates the type of this trip. Possible values are: ONE_WAY, ROUND_TRIP, MULTI_STOPS

id.description: The vendor identifier of the expected expense

name.description: The vendor description of the expected expense

WorkflowAction.description: Comment when the workflow action is ‘sendback’.
